headline.main: BENEFIT IS PLANNED FOR RUSSIAN RELIEF; New Organization Is to Open Drive at Garden on Oct. 27

lead_paragraph: A national campaign for funds will be opened at a benefit in Madison Square Garden Oct. 27 by the newly organized Russian War Relief, Inc., 535 Fifth Avenue, it was announced yesterday.
abstract: N Y C Russian War Relief launches ad campaign for food, clothing and med supplies
snippet: A national campaign for funds will be opened at a benefit in Madison Square Garden Oct. 27 by the newly organized Russian War Relief, Inc., 535 Fifth Avenue, it was announced yesterday....
